participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Reserved and thoughtful, enjoys creativity and technology.
participant_1.background: I'm a recording engineer and own my own studio. I live in California, but the recording artist market was dead last year. I'm a 46-year-old single dad with kids. My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. I prefer being inside.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, loves nature and exploring new challenges.
participant_2.background: I like to go hiking in the spring. I live in Colorado. I have a black lab named Trooper. I'm a mechanical engineer. My favorite activity is rock climbing.

content.text: hi there, i am from colorado
my favorite activity is rock climbing
